subject: Urgent: Please contact me!
description_text: I purchased the Pro X Ultra-P3-H3 on AliExpress on 2025/12/03 and it arrived on 2025/12/18, but only the brake is not responding. The throttle and clutch are confirmed to be working. When plugging into the controller box, only the brake does not respond. The others work no matter where they are plugged into the controller box. When I contacted AliExpress, they said they would refund 6828 yen. I was told to contact simsonn to repurchase just the brake, and that there would be a small price difference, but I couldn't find the brake sold separately online, so I am contacting you directly. I've seen many reviews saying the brake is difficult to adjust, but if it's not a malfunction, please tell me how to fix it as soon as possible.

conversations.body_text: Hi romeo kondo, When you click Offset and the pop-up screen appears, please first take a screenshot and send it to us. After that, please follow the steps to zero the pedal's original signal. Also, please take and send a clear photo of the entire side of the brake pedal. We will check whether it is an adjustment issue or a sensor failure. If we confirm it is a sensor failure, we will send you a new replacement sensor.
I am sending the photos. Please check them.
Hi romeo kondo,  There is no issue with your brake pedal. After adjusting the Offset, is the signal now working normally?
It is not functioning normally.

Hi,

Thank you for your reply.

Even after adjusting the Offset, the brake pedal still does not work
normally.
The signal drops to zero suddenly and does not respond, even when fully
pressed.

I have already tested:
- Reconnecting the cable
- Restarting the base and PC
- Recalibrating in Pit House
- Offset adjustment

The issue still remains, so this seems to be a hardware problem.

Please advise the next step for repair or replacement.

Thank you.
Hi romeo kondo,     Please provide the contact name, phone number, and shipping address, and I will arrange a replacement shipment for you.

Hi,

Thank you for your support.
Here is my contact information:

Contact name: Masatsugu Kondo
Phone number: 090-4303-6293
Shipping address:
Grand Ash Senri Furuiedai 503
5-3-2 Furuiedai, Suita-shi, Osaka 565-0874
Japan

Please proceed with the replacement shipment.
Thank you again.

Best regards,
Masatsugu Kondo
Hi romeo kondo,       Please provide your AliExpress order number or a screenshot of your order so that we can notify you of the tracking number online.
Hi romeo kondo,      Your product has been shipped. The logistics number is:YT2600800704728636. You can track it at this website:​https://t.17track.net/zh-cn#nums=YT2600800704728636

Hi,

Here is my AliExpress order number:
1117695178021151

I’ve also attached a screenshot of the order confirmation page for your
reference.

Also, I noticed that the package weight is listed as only 0.01 kg.
Could you please let me know what exactly is included in the shipment?

Looking forward to your reply.
Thank you!

Best regards,
Masatsugu Kondo
Hi romeo kondo,  Okay, here's a replacement brake sensor for you.

Hi,

Thank you for the replacement brake sensor.
I’ve received the tracking number and will wait for the delivery.

Best regards,
Masatsugu Kondo
Hi romeo kondo,  You're welcome. If you have any further questions, please feel free to contact us directly in the buyer chat.

Subject: Brake pedal not responding even after sensor replacement

Hello,

I am contacting you again regarding the brake pedal issue.

As instructed, I have already replaced the brake load cell sensor.
I also tested by swapping the brake sensor with the accelerator and clutch
sensors, but none of the sensors work when connected to the brake input.

This means the problem is not the sensor.
It appears that the brake input circuit on the pedal’s internal board is
not functioning.

At this point, I have tried every possible user-side solution.
Could you please arrange a repair or replacement of the internal board?

Thank you for your support.

I would appreciate it if you could send a replacement unit as soon as
possible.

Hi romeo kondo,  Hello, I have already reissued it to you.  Your product has been shipped. The logistics number is:YT2600800704728636. You can track it at this website:​https://t.17track.net/zh-cn#nums=YT2600800704728636

Subject: Item marked as delivered but not received

Hello,

According to the tracking information (YT2600800704728636), the package is
marked as delivered on January 13th at 11:20 AM.
However, I have not received the item.

Could you please check with the logistics provider (Yuntu Logistics) and
confirm the delivery status?
If the item was lost or misdelivered, I would appreciate a reshipment or
refund.

Thank you for your support

Subject: Item marked as delivered but not received     Hello,     According to the tracking information (YT2600800704728636), the package is marked as delivered on January 13th at 11:20 AM.  However, I have not received the item.     Could you please check with the logistics provider (Yuntu Logistics) and confirm the delivery status?  If the item was lost or misdelivered, I would appreciate a reshipment or refund.     Thank you for your support
Hi romeo kondo,  You can try checking at a package pickup point near your home, or wait a day or two.

The sensor you sent earlier has already arrived.
The package that is missing now is the replacement pedal unit (tracking
number: YT2600800704728636).
This one shows “delivered”, but I have not received it.

Hi romeo kondo,  Please send photos of the brake sensor you received, along with photos or videos of it malfunctioning, to our AliExpress online store. We will verify the information and then provide a solution.

*The brake sensor you sent earlier has already arrived and I have already
installed it.The problem is not the sensor.The item that is missing now is
the replacement pedal unit (tracking number: YT2600800704728636).It shows
“delivered”, but I have not received it.*

Hi romeo kondo,  The tracking number YT2600800704728636 indicates that we shipped brake sensors, but the main control box was not included. We were not previously told that the main control box was required.

Hi,

Thank you for your reply.
To clarify: the brake sensor you sent earlier has already arrived and I
have installed it.
However, the brake still does not work, so the main control box (pedal
unit) is required.
I thought the replacement pedal unit was being shipped with tracking number
YT2600800704728636.
Could you please confirm whether the replacement pedal unit will be sent?

Hi romeo kondo,     Could you please record a complete video and upload it to Google Drive? Then send me the link and set the sharing permission to “Anyone with the link can view.” The video should include the full process below (including zeroing the pedal signal following the steps inside the Offset pop-up dialog, and then Calibration/Calibrate):    Click Offset, and follow the steps in the pop-up dialog to zero the pedal signal;    Click Calibrate, then press each pedal with normal force;    Click Save;    After calibration, please test the pedals again — the blue progress bar should move smoothly from 0% to 100%. Only then is the calibration successful.

Hi,

Before I record a video, I need to clarify something.
The brake sensor you sent earlier has already arrived and I have installed
it.
However, the brake still does not respond at all — the signal stays at 0%
even after Offset and Calibration.
This means the problem is not the sensor.
The main control box (pedal unit) itself seems to be faulty and needs
replacement.

Could you please confirm whether the replacement pedal unit will be sent?
I can record a video if necessary, but the brake axis does not move at all.
Hi romeo kondo,  Okay, we will send you a replacement control box later.
Hi romeo kondo,  Your product has been shipped. The logistics number is:SF6047243605811. You can track it at this website:https://t.17track.net/zh-cn#nums=SF6047243605811
